root.name: Legend of Mir 3
root.description: The game was developed by South Korean company WeMade Entertainment, and became hugely popular in China and Korea.ControversyIn a high-profile case in China from October 2004, 41-year-old Qiu Chengwei was sentenced to death for murdering 26-year-old Zhu Caoyuan over a dispute regarding the sale of a virtual weapon the two had jointly won in the game Legend of Mir 3.
